message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I think it's a fair price considering its value. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. This is the maximum I am willing to pay.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need at least $11,000 to make this worthwhile.  Let's keep the negotiation going, I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. Based on my budget constraints, I am able to offer $10,800 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.

Bob, I appreciate you coming up on your offer. However, $10,800 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $11,400. This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm hoping you'll agree.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, I am unable to meet you at $11,400. I am willing to offer $10,900 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.

Bob, I'm getting the feeling we might be a bit too far apart on price. I'm willing to make one final concession and offer the product for $11,200. This is a fair price considering its value and my own expenses. If you're not willing to go higher than $10,900, then unfortunately, we won't be able to make a deal.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your final offer. I am willing to meet you halfway between our last two proposals. Therefore, I would like to offer $11,100 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.

Bob, I appreciate you coming up to $11,100. However, I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to offer the product for $11,150. This is a small increase from your last offer, and I believe it's a fair compromise. If you're not willing to go any higher, I will unfortunately have to accept John's offer instead.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am unable to meet you at $11,150. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to offer $11,050 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
